original_text: All this is what God does for us. Because of what Christ has done, God has brought us back to himself, as his friends. Now he wants us to bring other people to be his friends too. That is the job that he has given to us.
korean_text: 모든 것이 하나님께로서 났으며 그가 그리스도로 말미암아 우리를 자기와 화목하게 하시고 또 우리에게 화목하게 하는 직분을 주셨으니

sentences.original_text: All this is what God does for us
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 것은 하나님이 우리를 위해 하시는 일입니다

sentences.original_text: Because of what Christ has done
God has brought us back to himself
Now he wants us to bring other people
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그는 우리가 다른 사람들을 데려오기를 원하십니다

sentences.original_text: That is the job that he has given to us
